main_title_display: School board Chmn Wilson leader in every move for Negro education, fearless, devout, forward looking City Superintendent W?, friendly to Negro education but shy. Rural school agent Hilburn ? fully proud of this $22,000 building (It doesn't look it but it is one of the biggest, roomiest,lightest, best heated, best furnished schools in the state. Mayor Robbin, former Negro hater, now converted and active and bold in financing this building. XXX
